Developer Terms of Use
des:
Manage and use your X-Sense devices in the Alexa app.

Download the Alexa app, then create an Alexa account.

Choose the Skill option in the Alexa app, then search for "X-Sense Home Security." Enable X-Sense to use in the Alexa app and link your Alexa and X-Sense accounts to get started.
Once done, you can tell your voice assistant, such as Echo Spot, Echo-Show, Fire TVs, Fire TV (2nd), Fire TV Edition to use your X-Sense devices. When you have X-Sense security systems, including motion sensors, door and window sensors, for example:

To switch to Home Mode, say: "Alexa, arm my home."
To switch to Away Mode, say: "Alexa, arm my home in Away Mode."
To disarm your system, say: "Alexa, disarm my home."

When using X-Sense thermo-hygrometer products, you can check temperature or humidity using voice commands as follows:

"Alexa, what's the thermo-hygrometer temperature?"
"Alexa, what's the thermo-hygrometer humidity?"

If you encounter any problem, please troubleshoot as follows:

Troubleshooting

1. Alexa cannot find my devices.
Check your Wi-Fi connection, then restart your device.
2. The device shows "Offline" in the Alexa app.
The device may have lost its internet connection. Check your internet connection, and then restart your device.
3. I cannot manage my X-Sense devices through Alexa.
Check your Wi-Fi connection. Make sure when speaking to Alexa, you first say "Alexa", then say what you want clearly and correctly.
